org.spongepowered.api.event.game

Interface GameRegistryEvent.Register<T extends CatalogType>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the catalog type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Event, GameRegistryEvent, GenericEvent<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGameRegistryRegisterEvent
    Enclosing interface:
    GameRegistryEvent

    public static interface GameRegistryEvent.Register<T extends CatalogType>
extends GameRegistryEvent, GenericEvent<T>
    This event is called to allow additional registrations for specific CatalogTypes.

    When creating custom CatalogRegistryModules, implementing the AdditionalCatalogRegistryModule allows this event to be called for the target CatalogType. All the CatalogTypes will be registered through the AdditionalCatalogRegistryModule.registerAdditionalCatalog(CatalogType) method.

      • register

        void register(T catalogType)
        Registers the CatalogType.
        Parameters:
        catalogType - The catalog type
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If there is an id conflict with the given type and an existing type
        UnsupportedOperationException - If registration for the given type is not supported
        CatalogTypeAlreadyRegisteredException - If the type cannot be registered because a matching type was already registered
